backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing camera‑related feature reports, associated components, files, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens and global styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the CameraReaderScreen as the sole application view.
frontend/src/components/AudioStateCue.ts: Maps processing states to predefined messages and triggers announcements via parent LiveAnnouncer.
frontend/src/components/CameraPreview.ts: Camera preview component handling startup flow, preflight checks, fallback UI, error mapping, and capture operations.
frontend/src/components/CameraStartupFal: Accessible full‑screen fallback prompting the user to manually start the camera.
frontend/src/components/LiveAnnouncer.ts: ARIA live region component for emitting screen‑reader announcements when messages change.
frontend/src/components/OrientationPromp: Full‑screen prompt instructing users to rotate to portrait orientation with an assertive screen‑reader announcement.
frontend/src/components/PlaybackControls: Set of accessible playback control buttons for pause/resume, repeat, and speech‑rate adjustment.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCaptureHaptics.ts: Provides a simple vibration trigger for capture confirmation with fallback handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state using Dfinity AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnDeviceOcr.ts: Implements on-device OCR using Tesseract.js loaded from CDN, managing a shared worker and exposing text recognition with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrientation.ts: Tracks screen orientation by comparing window dimensions and exposes portrait/landscape state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Stub file indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextToSpeech.ts: Wraps the Web Speech API to provide speaking, pausing, resuming, rate control, and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for accessible color themes, focus states, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Screen component handling camera capture, OCR processing, text-to-speech playback, and accessibility announcements.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing an Android accessibility-focused OCR-to-speech app, its architecture, features, and known camera-start issue. It includes requirement-linked features, notes on privacy and UX, and flags the file as a fix request.
